description:
This course is a complete guide on how to create an online course and increase your income from up to 10,000 dollars per year.

First, we will see a start by seeing how to pick a topic, write the course outline and select the right format and equipment. We will then walks through the process of scripting, preparing and recording the course. This training also includes tips and tricks to make sure your course is not missing anything.

Last, I will show how to promote your course and use selling techniques to increase your sales.

This course also contains a free e-book on the topic.

At the end of this course, your online course should be ready to upload.
title: How To Create An Online Course In Less Than 10 Days
